triplets: Bag designed to be carried on the back using two shoulder straps, suitable for transporting personal items and supplies
Carrying personal belongings, books, laptops, clothing, outdoor gear, or school/work essentials
Durable fabrics such as nylon, polyester, canvas, or leather; metal or plastic components for zippers, buckles, and adjusters
Shoulder straps for comfortable carrying on the back
Pockets and compartments for organization of items
Top handle for carrying by hand
Varies widely; available in solid colors, patterns, and custom designs
Everyday carry items, school or work supplies, travel and outdoor equipment
Various manufacturers producing fashion, outdoor, and utility backpacks
Typically 0.5–2 kg depending on size, materials, and design
Approximately 30–50 cm depending on style and intended use
Approximately 3–10 years depending on material quality, usage, and maintenance
